content.description:
Climb the large crack just to the right of the main set of really rusty bolts on the main rock.  This is a good sustained slightly overhung crack with excellent gear placements, but sketchy rusty top anchors.

This crack is also the start of the rope drag heavy (and dangerous given the condition of the bolts) Bohemian Bypass (5.12c).
content.protection: Bring friends to 3". Walk up the 4th class corner to get to the top anchors.

content.description: This climb is on the steep face on the upper rock above a 4th class gully and above all the moderate crack climbs.  You can place good pro in the crack below the steep face prior to the first bolt.  3 bolts lead you up the steep face.  Small, fingery, face moves up solid rock bring you to the top.
content.protection: Three bolts to two bolt anchor.  The bolts look old and are rusted.  I would hesitate to trust these for a good fall.

content.description:
A fun lie-back finish gets the climb 2 stars.

Start in the 5.6 corner/gully, go up loose 4th class, and finish on the clean crack crack right of Jury Duty. Build gear anchor.
content.location: Between Jury Duty Crack of Zorro. Topo in Chris Summit's Wine Country Rocks

content.description: Pass 2 bolts traversing up and left to an awkward rest before the crux on the arete. Then pumpy technical moves will take you to the top from there.
content.protection: 8 bolt sport climb or top rope from bolt anchors on top (long slings).

content.description:
Jury Duty shares the first 5 bolts with Judge Dredd before continuing straight up to the thin hard pocket crux. Then a short traverse right to the 5.6 crack "Sandbagger" will take you to the top.

First Ascent = Jason Campbell / Jim Thornburg.
content.protection: 9 bolt sport climb with a 5.6 crack at the finish which takes good gear (optional) or top rope from bolt anchors on top.

content.description: Judge Dredd shares the first 5 bolts with Jury Duty before busting out left and up past 4 more bolts for a total of 9 bolts all together.
content.protection: Relatively safe 9 bolt sport climb or top rope from easily accessible top rope bolt anchors.

content.description: Several crack options on this lower wall right of Jury Duty. 2 bolt anchor with rap rings.
content.location: This wall is shown as P1 of Crack of Zorro in the Jim Thornburg Bay Area Rock guide.
